A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: At the end of the day\, I highly enjoyed this film. It is filled to the brim with spectacular visuals and cinematography\, although the acting and plot fall pretty short of its original predecessors. Mark Hamill is an interesting exception\, followed by an unusual\, enthralling and bombastic performance by Adam Driver as Kylo Ren. Overall\, the movie had some major flaws\, but with managed expectations\, The Last Jedi delivers confirmed entertainment with a bit too many laughs.
